Open Gym

An option when you have your own group and want some time on the low rims with custom settings.

About Open Gyms

Do you have a bunch of guys you hoop with that want to try playing on some lower rims? Or have way more than enough for a team and would prefer to try this out instead? This is the option for you if so! Come play for fun with your own group and pick custom settings such as how tall you want the hoop or how many guys are playing at once!

Live shot of some dudes getting buckets ... mid-open gym.

Check out our pricing chart below and sign-up! NOTE: The recommended player count is just a suggestion to optimize playing time and price. Feel free to bring as many or as few people as you'd like for any option.
